detail.content: Weekend Workshops                                                                                          The NYU School of Professional Studies Website    Faculty    Degrees    Professional Certificates    Upcoming Events        Search Courses     Credit Course     Non-Credit Course          Site    Noncredit Courses    Faculty                                                                                                                                               High School Academy-Weekend Workshops                                            Weekend Workshops ›                FAQs               Summer Programs ›           Critical Instructions for Admitted Students ›           Photo Gallery ›           Watch Videos ›                            More Links           Request Information        Contact Us by E-mail                                                                                 High School Academy Weekend Workshops                         In addition to excellent grades, the college admissions process requires that high school students demonstrate that they are serious about their academic and professional future. The NYU School of Professional Studies High School Academy is now offering weekend workshops to provide high school students with programs of study that allow them to explore their professional options and to enhance their college portfolio.     These workshops are offered in condensed, weekend formats and are taught by top industry experts. They offer rigorous coursework and serve as an impressive addition on a college application.   Spring workshops begin in February, and the deadline to apply is February 16, 2015 . Space is limited.           In order to qualify for the program, students must be between the ages of 15-19. In addition, due to the academic rigor of the program, we highly recommend that students who choose to enroll in these courses have achieved a minimum of a 3.0 GPA.              Courses        Program Information   Dates:  February 28–April 4, 2015   Application Deadline :  February 16, 2015   Program Contact :   Phone : (212) 998-7006   E-mail : scps.hsacademy@nyu.edu            College Writing: Understanding Grammar through Writing–The Ultimate Connection         Creative Approaches to Writing the College Application Essay (NEW)         Debates in Global Affairs: The Ethics of Conflict         Fantastical Fiction: Building Worlds with Words         Fundamentals of Sports Management–The Game Beyond the Playing Field (NEW)         Interactive Marketing Campaigns: The Power of Public Relations and Social Media         Investing Fundamentals: Shaping Your Financial Future         Journalism: Reporting, Researching, and Writing News and Features (NEW)         Launching Your Own Digital Business (NEW)         Performing Arts: Improvisation Workshop (NEW)         Songwriting: Learn How to Do What You Love       Studio Art: Drawing (NEW)         Cost: $375.00           Cost: $250.00           Cost: $250.00           Cost: $500.00         Cost: $300.00           Cost: $300.00           Cost: $225.00           Cost: $375.00           Cost: $375.00         Cost: $300.00         Cost: $150.00         Cost: $225.00   Lab Fee: $50.00          Please Note : No classes will be held on Saturday, March 14, 2015.          High School Academy Handbook   All students and parents/guardians should read the High School Academy Handbook so they are familiar with the rules and the policies of the program.
